name: EVA (itch) (ZeeHatcher, Zircon332, KiraDragon)
description:
Shoot your way through hordes of foes and try to survive for as long as possible in this minimalistic top-down shooter.

How To Play
  • Press and hold SPACE to charge.
  • Release to shoot.
  • Projectile damage, speed, and size scales with the charge level.
  • Release at the right time for a powerful piercing shot!
  • Try and survive for as long as you can!
